title: Sci-Fi Guns Sound Pack
description: A sound package including 240 futuristic weapon sound effects, consisting of mono and stereo versions of audio files.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sci-fi-guns-sound-pack-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wimxjx5ic1ndort/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Guns%20Sound%20Pack.pdf?dl=0


The collection contains 240 professionally designed sound effects of cannon (2 variations), handgun (3), laser gun (2), machine gun (2), plasma (3), power gun (2), rifle (4) and shotgun (2). Each weapon includes 4 burst shot variations and 8 single shot variations.


There are a total of 20 weapons in the package.


Use this asset to create high-quality gun shots and weapon sounds for your game, animation or trailer. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 240 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, mono & stereo
  • 480 audio files in total
  • 2 cannons, 3 handguns, 2 laser guns, 2 machine guns
  • 3 plasma guns, 2 power guns, 4 rifles, 2 shotguns
  • 20 guns in total
  • 4 burst shot variations, 8 single shot variations
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for shooters, strategies and more

 

Number of Audio Waves: 480

Number of Audio Cues: 480

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 7 minutes 07 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
